knimeNode.name: Linear Discriminant Analysis Apply
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node applies a linear discriminant analysis.

fullDescription.intro:
This node applies a Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) on the given input data. The data model of the LDA computation node can be applied to arbitrary data to reduce it to a given number of dimensions.
The column names, however, have to coincide with those used to calculate the model.
fullDescription.option: If checked, the columns containing the input data are removed.

ports.inPort: The Model to reduce the dimensions with
The data to reduce the dimensions of
ports.outPort: The original data (if not excluded) plus columns for the projected dimensions
